user_query: I'm organizing a team-building event for my company. Can you help me gather some motivational quotes to inspire my colleagues? Additionally, I need to retrieve the latest time from PubNub Network's time API to set the schedule for the event. Lastly, I'd like to check my account balance on sms77io to ensure I have enough credits to send out the event reminders.

TaskList.description: Gather motivational quotes to inspire colleagues.
Retrieve the latest time from PubNub Network's time API for event scheduling.
Check my account balance on sms77io to ensure enough credits for sending reminders.
